title: Boris needs an election to slay this zombie Parliament, which has Brexit in its deathly grip
text:
Some MPs just can't handle the truth. When Geoffrey Cox boomed at them last month that this parliament was a "dead parliament" with "no moral right to sit on these green benches", they were affronted to be denounced in such terms.

"If the Attorney General so dislikes Parliament," Labour's Valerie Vaz declared as she demanded an apology, "perhaps he should spend more time with his cases and call a by-election". But Mr Cox stood firm and insisted he would "certainly not" apologise for his remarks, adding that he he stood by "every one" of them.

Mr Cox's anger was understandable - the opposition parties, despite claiming to be eager for an election, had derailed Boris Johnson's efforts to hold...
description: Some MPs just can't handle the truth.
